properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 13 at 3:28AM MST until February 14 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Blowing Snow Occurring. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph.


* WHERE...Northern Rocky Mountain Front.

* WHEN...From 6 AM this morning to 5 AM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce
visibility.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing and drifting snow will become more
widespread today as gusty west to southwest winds increase
through this afternoon. Exposed areas with a substantial snow
cover will see the greatest impacts, including Highway 89 from
Dupuyer north to the Canadian border and Highway 2 from Browning
to East Glacier Park.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST FRIDAY
